code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import ProductListItem from'./ProductListItem';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductList(){const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{axios.get('/api/products').then(res=>setProducts(res.data)).catch(()=>{setProducts([]);setError('Failed to load products');});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl",children:"Products"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"space-y-3",children:products.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"text-center text-gray-600",children:"No products found."}):products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductListItem,{product:product},product._id))})]})]});}export default ProductList;
